markdownRemark.html: Spanish lessons in Malaga. The school is located directly on the beach – with this they assure you not only that you will have a great time improving your Spanish skills, but that you will also enjoy your free time. They offer Spanish, English, German and French courses either in small groups or as private lessons.

frontmatter.title: Escuela La Playa
